title: Gazelle Indoor Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: A revival of the Gazelle Indoor sneakers from 1979, these adidas shoes have all the details that soccer fans, indie rockers and sneakerheads have loved for decades. Soft suede and a durable leather lining come together on a gum rubber outsole with a translucent effect. The 3-Stripes and metallic-gold lettering complete the authentic look.
details: Lace closure; Suede upper; Leather lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Blue Bird / Cloud White / Blue Bird; Product code: H06260
colors: Blue Bird / Cloud White / Blue Bird

title: Forum 84 Low Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
'80s B-ball lives on in these adidas Forum shoes. The elite B-ball sneakers of their time, they quickly made waves on and off the hardwood. Lace in and feel the pulse of the game and the energy of the era. Crisp leather makes your look shine.

This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.
details: Lace closure with ankle strap; Leather upper; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cream White / Collegiate Green / Silver Metallic; Product code: GZ8959
colors: Off White / Scarlet / Collegiate Royal

title: Ultraboost DNA Shoes
subtitle: Men's Sportswear
description: There's always a new route to explore. A new personal best to meet. Along for the journey are these adidas Ultraboost DNA running shoes. Boost cushioning helps you find your stride comfortably. The Continental™ Rubber outsole lets you push forward with confidence. And all that heat you build? The melted ice cream effect shows it off.

title: Predator Absolute Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Men's Soccer
description: Only the very best get to wear golden adidas boots on football's biggest stage. As Argentina's legendary 10 sets out to lift the ultimate prize, these special X Speedportal boots celebrate Lionel Messi's glittering legacy. Inspired by details from the boots he wore on his big stage debut in 2006, their adaptive adidas PRIMEKNIT upper stands out in gold. On the lightweight Speedframe outsole, a springy Carbitex carbon-fibre insert will help him towards his first world cup trophy.
details: Lace closure; Leather upper; Fold-over tongue; Predator Absolute-style forefoot pads; Firm ground outsole; Imported; Product color: Gold Metallic / Cloud White / Gold Metallic; Product code: HP9137

title: Adilette Comfort Slides
subtitle: Yoga
description: Whether you're heading to the locker room after an intense gym session or at home recovering on the couch, these slides keep your feet wrapped in lightweight comfort. Pair them with socks and shorts for your post-workout look or with your favorite swimwear for the ultimate beach vibe. The adidas 3-Stripes design completes your sport style.
details: Regular fit; Slip-on construction; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Lightweight cushioning; Contoured footbed; EVA outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black; Product code: GZ5896
colors: Core Black / Core White / Grey Six

title: Ultra 4DFWD Shoes
subtitle: Running
description:
Experience a smooth run with the Ultra 4DFWD running shoes. They combine the upper of our iconic Ultraboost with a 3D-printed adidas 4DFWD midsole that's innovated to compress forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result provides a smooth transition and unique gliding experience. An adidas PRIMEKNIT upper hugs the foot with targeted areas of support, while the Continental™ Rubber outsole provides extra grip in all weather conditions.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; adidas 4D midsole; Textile lining; Weight: 13.9 ounces; Midsole drop: 11 mm (heel: 32 mm / forefoot: 21 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Aluminium / Zero Metalic / Magic Beige; Product code: GY9837
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Carbon

description: Take your performance to the next level in these adidas golf shoes. They're made with a BOOST midsole for energy return and enhanced comfort. The 360Wrap design locks in and supports your feet through 18 holes and beyond. An INSITE® sockliner offers cushioning for optimal fit and balance, and the SPIKEMORE traction outsole provides solid grip throughout your entire round.
details: Ergonomic fit; Leather upper with padded collar; 360Wrap support; INSITE® sockliner; Dual stack BOOST midsole; SPIKEMORE traction and six-spike TPU outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Shadow Green / Linen Green; Product code: GY4541
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Blue Rush

description:
Green isn't just for your smoothies. The iconic adidas Forum shoe gets a modern spin that celebrates your plant-based lifestyle. The shades of green will remind you of your favorite juice. Take a look at the shoe's sockliner and lace jewel to reveal which ingredient inspired your particular pair. The tongue playfully reminds you to "make it juicy." 

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Vegan alternative: At least 25% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Linen Green / Almost Lime; Product code: GY1894

description: In the '80s, the adidas Forum proved its mettle on the hardwood. Since then, it's stepped off the court to become a key player in music and street culture. This mid-cut version is a one-to-one reissue of the original, complete with the same materials, pattern and details.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure with removeable strap; Leather upper; Jersey sockliner; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Shock Pink; Product code: G57984
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Shock Pink

description: The adidas OZWEEGO Shoes are meant for impact. Not just on your comfort levels — which they definitely raise with the undeniable power trifecta of EVA, Adiprene and Adiprene+ cushioning — but also on your look. The bold silhouette and fluid lines can't help but make an impression. Which is exactly the point.
details: Snug fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Adiprene cushioning; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Purple Tint / Purple Tint / Dash Grey; Product code: GX1980
colors: Linen Green / Dash Grey / Feather Grey

description:
Why should you settle for anything less than outrageously comfortable? The adidas NMD_R1 shoes ensure you don't have to, packing running-shoe technology into a daily pair. As you answer the call of city adventures, you'll have responsive BOOST cushioning and a soft knit upper giving feet a heel-to-toe hug. We don't expect you to compromise on style either. These sleek shoes evolve an '80s design. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Stretch knit upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Almost Blue / Vivid Red; Product code: GZ9593
colors: Bright Orange / Bright Orange / Core Black

description: Pick up your dry cleaning or chill in the park with your pals. Dress in track pants or chinos. Wear whatever you want as you do all of your everyday deeds in style and comfort in these adidas shoes. The iconic 3-Stripes on the synthetic leather upper, plus a rubber cupsole underneath, create a heritage vibe.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; Cushioned feel; Textile lining; EVA sockliner; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Six; Product code: GW3020
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Despite the adrenaline-pumping excitement of the sport, the culture surrounding skateboarding is notoriously laid back. These toddlers' shoes channel that relaxed feel into a stylish everyday sneaker. All the hallmarks of a classic skate shoe are elevated with stitched-in adidas 3-Stripes on the side.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Hook-and-loop closure; Canvas upper; Textile lining; Textured toe; Stitched-in 3-Stripes; Vulcanized rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Core Black; Product code: GZ3346
